      • commitTxIfNecessary

        public boolean commitTxIfNecessary()
                            throws javax.jms.JMSException
        Helper method that checks if session is transacted and whether to commit the tx based on commitAfterXMsgs property.
        Returns:
        true if transaction was committed.
        Throws:
        javax.jms.JMSException - in case the call to JMS Session.commit() fails.
